summary: We audited compliance with the Lobbying Disclosure Act, which requires paid lobbyists to disclose their activities, political contributions, and certain criminal convictions. We examined a random sample of lobbying disclosure reports, interviewed responsible lobbyists, sought documentation, and cross-checked contributions reports. We found that Lobbyists complied with reporting requirements under the Justice Against Corruption on K Street Act of 2018 (JACK Act). Unreported political contributions continue...
title: 2019 Lobbying Disclosure: Observations on Lobbyists' Compliance with Disclosure Requirements [Reissued with revisions on Jun. 9, 2020.]
